page.shortlink: dt ref db Copying a Database Design
page.description: To copy a DBF database design to a new location, you need to avoid copying any test data that the design contains. You should copy all files except :

case.description: ASX - A temporary file containing the indexing information generated by a query against a set.
FPT - Memo field data, which may include text or graphics
MPX - A temporary file containing the indexing information generated by a query against a table.
